commandDescription: Upsert csv files based on permissionsets
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input permissionsets. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output permissionsets. Default: '%s'
typeFlagDescription: Specify the type of permission to upsert. Example: fieldPermissions, objectPermissions
tagidFlagDescription: Specify the tag ID(s) for the upsert operation. Use comma-separated values for multiple IDs
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
